description:
Rukia, Renji, and Sado struggle against the giant Yammy. However, when they see Yammy’s tattoo of the number “10”, they realize that he is weaker than the Espadas they’ve fought in the past. Each one of them tries to go after Yammy, but Yammy releases  his sword, Ira , which overwhelms them. Meanwhile, in Karakura Town, the battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada, led by Aizen, intensifies. Halibel attacks Hitsugaya, who achieves Bankai and counterattacks, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fury of a Shark! Halibel Releases
La furie du requin, Hallibel se libère
鮫の猛威! ハリベル解放
